entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over eastern sections. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:02 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 5 except plus 1 over eastern sections.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Snow over eastern sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5 except plus 1 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:02 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow over eastern sections. Amount 2 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:02 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
